contentencoded:
It's international quiz time on the Marketplace Morning Report. Stephan Richter, editor-in-chief of the online international affairs magazine, The Globalist, brings us the question below.



Scroll down to see the answer and click on the audio player above to hear more about China's next "leap forward".





























Answer: D. Ecuador
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 22, 2013
teaser: When it comes to per capita income level, which country is most like China?
title: Quiz: How does China compare?
description: When it comes to per capita income level, which country is most like China?
